channel.title: rstudy on Vienna R User Group
channel.description: Recent content in rstudy on Vienna R User Group

item.title: Wordcloud Wienerwald
item.description: After a very nice hands-on introduction in yesterday’s Vienna R meetup meeting from Mario Annau, I created an example of textmining ending with a wordcloud. As the blog is called ViennaR, I chose to use a play strongly related to Vienna - Ödön von Horváth - Geschichten aus dem Wienerwald.

item.title: Bike Parking Lots in Vienna
item.description:
Another addition to the OpenGovernmentVienna repo by Christian Brandstaetter showing the density of bike parking lots in Vienna.

The script executes the following steps:

  1. Download Vienna map including district boundaries and bike parking lots from http://data.wien.gv.at.
  2. Plot two Vienna maps showing bike parking lots and density per district.

item.title: Population Densities in Vienna
item.description:
The new Github repository OpenGovernmentVienna has already been created including a very nice addition by Christian.

The script executes the following steps:

  1. Download Vienna map including district boundaries from http://data.wien.gv.at.
  2. Download population and district size from https://www.wien.gv.at/statistik, calculate population density.
  3. Plot Vienna map coloured by population density.
